com.xtructure.xevolution.gui.components
Class NumberedTextPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  com.xtructure.xevolution.gui.components.NumberedTextPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class NumberedTextPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

NumberedTextPanel is a custom panel that displays text with line numbers.

Author:
Luis Guimbarda
See Also:
Serialized Form
